Package Management.Quarter.ProductionQuarter

Class ProductionQuarter

java.lang.Object
Management.Quarter.Quarter
Management.Quarter.ProductionQuarter.ProductionQuarter
Direct Known Subclasses:
Berth, Birdcatcher, Cryptoinvestor, Cryptomine, DataCenter, DimensionlessSpace, Galley, HellishBoss, IASynthetisTank, MadScientist, ParadoxalGenerator, ProgrammersOffice, TemporalCaboose, VirtualQuantumComputer
public abstract class ProductionQuarter extends Quarter
The parent abstract class of every quarter which produce or boost the production of resources.

    • loadAllValues

      protected void loadAllValues()
      Load the properties of the quarter by reading them in the productionBuildingsData.

    • baseCalculationProduction

      public void baseCalculationProduction()
      Computes the production of the quarter.
      The production depends on the production per crew member and the number of crew member attributed to the quarter. It also takes into account the productionPerCrewBonusRate, productionBonusConstant and productionBonusRate properties.
      Overrides:
      baseCalculationProduction in class Quarter
